LanguageData.DMS_Artifuscle.label: artificial muscle

LanguageData.DMS_Automatroid.label: automatroid basis
LanguageData.DMS_Automatroid.description:
because they are not just a weapon but weapon that is capable to eliminate target by themselves, these robots was such a topic and own a name to them "automatroid"
Such a morally outrageous weapon should never acceptable at normal, but since it is widely used by nations during ww3 so it has become a mundane part of the battlefield..

LanguageData.DMS_DeadMansSwitch.label: Dead Man's Switch
LanguageData.DMS_DeadMansSwitch.description:
The Dead Man's Switch is a mechanical safety mechanism intended to self-terminate device active when the operator becomes incapacitated.
Before human seek into space, they discovered this machanism will eventually made artificial intelligence understand...the meaning of death... this discover lead humanity to new era of history....
an era of those fifth level ai.
LanguageData.DMS_DeadMansSwitch.discoveredLetterText:
Some of the advanced automatroid required specific part which is not manufactured in gravity environment.
But the colonial fleet told us that we can feel free to attract and destroy their out of command automatroids to obtain those parts.

LanguageData.DMS_Hybird.label: Hybird Engineering
LanguageData.DMS_Hybird.description:
The establishment of biological-mechanical hybrid technology was during WW3, where mercenary who was soldiers in countries whrere involved in the war established an armed state with military personnel,using drone and hybrid prosthetic helping the retired wounded return to battle.
And soon, countries military realized the influence of bio-mechanical hybrids on modern warfare and rushed to armed in their armies.
